entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:08 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 11:56 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -36.8°C
Wind: NW 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Blowing snow at times in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
